subSubSection.paragraph:
Macrelmis consors Hinton, 1940
g: 131

PERU : Langui River, Titicaca Basin—Roback et al . ( 1980 ), Brown ( 1984 ), Manzo and Archangelsky ( 2012 ).
Austrelmis consors mooni (Hinton, 1940 )

Macrelmis gilsoni Hinton, 1940
g: 137

tr.th: PERU: Arequipa, Satipo, Sani Beni, Langhi

subSubSection.paragraph:
Austrelmis patagonicus Manzo & Archangelsky, 2012 : 269
ARGENTINA : Neuquén—Manzo and Archangelsky ( 2012 ).
BOLIVIA : Paton—Hinton ( 1937 d, 1940g ), Roback et al . ( 1980 ), Manzo and Moya ( 2010 ), Manzo and Archangelsky ( 2012 ).

BOLIVIA : La Paz—Manzo and Moya ( 2010 ), Manzo and Archangelsky ( 2012 ). PERU : Satipo, Sani Beni—Hinton ( 1937 d, 1940 f, 1940g ), Brown ( 1984 ), Passos et al . ( 2010 ), Manzo and Archangelsky ( 2012 ).
VENEZUELA : Colonia Tovar—Dèleve ( 1970 ).

Austrolimnius bocainensis
Miranda, Sampaio & Passos, 2012 : 21
BRAZIL : Rio de Janeiro: Nova Friburgo, São Paulo: São José do Barreiro—Miranda et al . ( 2012 ).
VENEZUELA : Trujillo, Bocono, Merida—Hinton ( 1971 c).
CHILE :?—Champion ( 1918 ), Hinton ( 1936 b, 1939 e, 1941 a), Blackwelder ( 1944 ).

Austrolimnius elatus HInton, 1941
Austrolimnius elatus Hinton, 1941 a: 161
CHILE :?—Hinton ( 1941 a).
BRAZIL : Goiás—Hinton ( 1971 c), Manzo ( 2007 ).

ECUADOR : Andes—Monte and Mascagni ( 2012 ). GUATEMALA : Escuintla—Hinton ( 1971 c), Manzo ( 2007 ). PANAMA : Pacora, Cocle, Candelaria—Hinton ( 1971 c), Manzo ( 2007 ). VENEZUELA :?—Monte and Mascagni ( 2012 ).
BRAZIL : Rio de Janeiro: Angra dos Reis, Cachoeiras de Macacu, Casimiro de Abreu, Guapimirim, Itatiaia, Nova Friburgo, Teresópolis—Passos et al . ( 2009 ), Miranda et al . ( 2012 ).
COSTA RICA : San José—Hinton ( 1971 c).
GUATEMALA : Escuintla, Santa Rosa , San Marcos, Suchitepequez, Vera Paz, San Joaquín– Sharp ( 1882 ), Hinton ( 1940 d, 1941 a, 1971 c), Blackwelder ( 1944 ).

MEXICO : Chiapas, Ortiz Rubio, Jitolol, Morelos, Alpyuyeca, Palo Bolero, Guerrero, Saucito, Temascaltepec, Tejupilco, Real de Arriba, Morelos, Cuernavaca—Hinton ( 1940 d, 1941 a, 1971 c), Blackwelder ( 1944 ). VENEZUELA : Trujillo, Bocono—Hinton ( 1971 c).

Austrolimnius halffteri Hinton, 1972 d: 136
MEXICO : Guerrero—Hinton ( 1972 d).

BRAZIL : Santa Catarina: Águas Mornas (=Theresopolis), São Paulo: São José do Barreiro, Rio de Janeiro: Angra dos Reis, Cachoeiras de Macacu, Casimiro de Abreu, Itatiaia, Nova Friburgo, Rio de Janeiro, Teresópolis— Grouvelle ( 1889 ), Hinton ( 1941 a), Passos et al . ( 2009 ), Miranda et al . ( 2012 ).
VENEZUELA : Merida, Parque Nacional Sierra Nevada—Gómez and Bello ( 2006 ).
FRENCH GUIANA : St. Laurent du Moroni—Hinton ( 1939 e, 1941 a), Blackwelder ( 1944 ).

BRAZIL : Santa Catarina: Águas Mornas (=Theresopolis), Rio de Janeiro: Cachoeiras de Macacu, Nova Friburgo, São Paulo: São José do Barreiro—Grouvelle ( 1889 ), Hinton ( 1941 a), Passos et al . ( 2009 ), Miranda et al . ( 2012 ).
BRAZIL : Rondônia: Porto Velho—Hinton ( 1941 a, 1968 ), Delève ( 1970 ). EQUADOR : Oriente—Delève ( 1968 ), Monte and Mascagni ( 2012 ).
COSTA RICA : San José—Hinton ( 1971 c).
GUATEMALA : Escuintla—Hinton ( 1971 c).

MEXICO : Chiapas, Jitolol, Ortiz Rubio, Guerrero, Saucito—Hinton ( 1940 d, 1941 a, 1971 c), Blackwelder ( 1944 ). PANAMA : Chiriquí, Bambito,Volcán Chiriquí—Sharp ( 1882 ), Hinton ( 1940 d, 1941 a, 1971 c), Blackwelder ( 1944 ).
BOLIVIA : Yungas Valley, Unduavi River, Chaco– Hinton ( 1941 a), Déleve ( 1968 ), Manzo and Moya ( 2010 ). ECUADOR : Napo, Papallacta, Andes—Monte and Mascagni ( 2012 ).

Austrolimnius uncatus
Miranda, Sampaio & Passos, 2012 : 15
BRAZIL : Rio de Janeiro: Nova Friburgo, São Paulo: São José do Barreiro—Miranda et al . ( 2012 ).
